name: Aziza
description:
Notice - This game contains Religious Symbolism to enhance the story. In no way this is used to offend anyone. This game is just a Prototype that was made in 9 days and will receive its next update on the 1st of July that will conclude its story.

You are a young girl trying to escape an abusive home. Dodge obstacles, traps and enemies to find your freedom. However the battle you are fighting is more in your mind than anywhere else.
